query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Optimisation Metrics and Benchmarking
result.description: Describes the industry-driven optimisation metrics related to each business case, the respective data collection strategies and the respective configuration quality evaluation methods. Defines the real-time constraints to the data analytics, optimisation and reconfiguration of each business case. Identifies benchmarks that will be used during the evaluation of the data analytics and optimisation engine prototypes.

result.title: Robust and energy-efficient hardware components II
result.description: AVN is main responsible for delivery, with contributions from TWG and RUB. This deliverable comprises a library of dedicated hardware components and a report presenting the design, implementation, performance, and power consumption characteristics of the components. These deliverables are prepared within Task 4.2 and satisfy WP Objective 4.1 and 4.4.

result.title: Integrated data analysis system II
result.description: TWG is main responsible for delivery, with contributions from NCSR-D and S&C. This deliverable consists of (a) the integrated data analysis prototype that integrates the prototypes D3.2, D3.3, D3.4; and (b) a report setting requirements on the data provided by the sensor hardware and on the transfer, security, privacy and authentication characteristics of the communication protocols. These deliverables are prepared within Task 3.5 and satisfy Objectives 3.3 and 3.5.

result.title: Project showcase
result.description: NCSR-D is main responsible for delivery, with contributions from all partners. A package (in the form of set of documents and software components) with the main results of the project and a brief, self-explanatory description of each core contribution/outcome. The Commission will be granted the right to use the project showcase for its own dissemination and awareness activities (including Web based and electronic publications). The project showcase will feature a meaningful demonstration of the functionality of the overall RADIO system, along with relevant copyright notices and contact information, and suitable installation aids and run-time interfaces. This deliverable is prepared within Task 7.2 and satisfies Objectives 7.1, 7.2, 7.3.

result.description: FZ is main responsible for delivery, with contributions from FHAG. This deliverable will report the finding of User evaluation in terms of usability of the system and improvement in quality of life. result.title: ADL and mood recognition methods II
result.description: R-PU. NCSR-D is main responsible for delivery, with contributions from TWG, RUB, and AVN. Methods for ADL and mood recognition from visual and acoustic data. The scope of delivery comprises (a) the report that documents the methods and (b) the prototype implementations that will be integrated into deliverables D3.9 and D3.10. These deliverables are prepared within Task 3.2 and satisfy Objective 3.1.

result.title: Network robustness and efficiency methods I
result.description: TWG is main responsible for delivery, with contributions from S&C and AVN. Methods for improving network robustness and communication efficiency. The scope of delivery comprises (a) the report that documents the methods and (b) the prototype implementations that will be integrated into deliverables D3.9 and D3.10. These deliverables are prepared within Task 3.3 and satisfy Objective 3.2.
